Description: Body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery kernos with part of one vessel holder; white slip (mostly worn); interior, rising rays; on top, vertical strokes between holders; inside of holder glazed; outside very worn with only trace of pattern band; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 249, no. 358)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2168) (phase 2)
